archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Data Exchange Component
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Implements the functionality that enables the secure exchange of messages, records, forms and other kinds of data between different ICT systems. This includes data routing, except endpoint discovery.
Based on EIFv2 http://ec.europa.eu/isa/documents/isa_annex_ii_eif_en.pdf

properties.value: [ Exposed for reuse as main service | Exposed for reuse as supporting service | Reused ]
